description:
Move freely at the gym or crag in these comfy climbing tights. The fabric is woven instead of knit to resist abrasion better. Great for climbing, yoga or light hiking, these tights are your gateway to good times outside (or inside).

  • Made of stretch woven nylon and spandex that's durable enough to stand up to the rigors of climbing and hiking
  • Wide yoga pants-style waistband is comfortable under a harness or hipbelt
  • A side drop-in stretch pocket gives you space to store your phone and other small essentials
  • Gusseted crotch and stretchy fabric ensure plenty of room to move
  • Flatlock seams feel smooth against the skin
  • 7/8-style 25 in. inseam
name: MEC Gateway Tights - Women's
